info.title: Controller Plugin
info.description: The Controller plugin controls (activates and deactivates) the configured plugins. The plugin is part of the framework and cannot be activated or deactivated itself, thus as well cannot not be unloaded.

autostart.description: Determines if the plugin is to be started along with the framework (always *true* as Controller is a part of the framework)

downloadstore.description: Path within persistent storage to hold file downloads

ttl.description: TTL to be set on the broadcast package for framework discovery in the network (default: 1)

resumes.description: List of callsigns that have an *IStateControl* interface and need a resume at startup

subsystems.description: List of subsystems configured for the system
